metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7692 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The crypto_xmit function in ntpd in NTP 4.2.x before 4.2.8p4, and 4.3.x before 4.3.77 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash).  NOTE: This vulnerability exists due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2014-9750.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7692` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.5
ntpdate - 1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.5
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> same commits as CVE-2015-7691 commits incorrectly state CVE-2014-9297

criterions.comment: ntp package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.5').
